name: Classic Turkey Club Sandwich
ingredients: 6 slices thick-cut white or sourdough bread
steps:
Cook bacon in a large skillet over medium heat until crispy, about 6-8 minutes. Drain on paper towels and set aside.
Toast all 6 slices of bread until golden brown.
In a small bowl, mix mayonnaise and Dijon mustard.
Spread the mayonnaise-mustard mixture on one side of each bread slice.
To assemble the first layer: Place one slice of bread (mayo side up) on a cutting board.
Layer with 1/3 of the turkey slices, then top with a second bread slice.
Add 2-3 slices of bacon, tomato slices, and lettuce leaves on the second bread slice.
Top with the third bread slice (mayo side down).
Secure the sandwich with toothpicks inserted diagonally through all layers.
Cut the sandwich diagonally into 4 triangles.
Repeat with remaining ingredients to make a second sandwich.
Serve immediately with chips, pickles, or a side salad.
